Stop-loss strategy: Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% or the ROE/ROA/OPM/Gross profit margin drops by 20%
Stop loss at 70% of current price, sell when ROE < 10%
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the DBR exceeds 70%.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price drops by 15% from the current price or when the moving average (50-day) falls below the moving average (200-day).
